Eg of how Yami works is that most ladies buy and use their wedding gowns once. For instance Mary bought her wedding gown and used it for her marriage two years ago. Since then the gown lies idle in her wardrobe. Yami gives Mary an opportunity of making money off her gown. She simply signs up on Yami with a clear picture of the gown, fills in a detailed description of it and uploads it for rent. name: Yuzah
product_desc: Yuzah uses IoT integrated to its on-demand delivery platform to  track home or office fuel levels and to trigger refill orders to suppliers on the platform. Kind of an Uber but for home/office fuel consumables.Fuels needed to run homes and businesses in many 3rd World countries include propane gas, diesel and petrol. Propane gas is primarily used for cooking but also used to run generators. Diesel and petrol are used to run generators, besides vehicles. Generators are often the primary source of power to most homes and businesses in many parts of Africa. Using Yuzah is better for managing fuel usage because a user: (1) No longer needs to worry if he/she will run out of fuel at the least expected time. (2) Has the fuel brought to him/her rather than lugging around a 12.5Kg propane gas cylinder, a 50Kg container for diesel or petrol to the first seller that has stock and can sell to you. (3) Is no longer concerned about being sold less fuel than payed for.
high_concept: Yuzah ensures you never run out of the fuel needed to run your home or business
markets: Energy Management, Internet of Things, Same Day Delivery, Online Marketplaces

As well as enables prospective buyers ready to make purchases to easily access farmers profile based on the quantity and quality of produce available for take-off. Our strategy is to drive the market closer to the last mile rural farmer in Nigeria and increase their ability to deliver product to market before it spoils through one online market pool system.

That thing is desirable. That thing is worth reading, worth watching, worth listening to, worth spending time on. That is what Trendiee is all about So you can say, trendiee is the new definition of HOT! At Trendiee, we have a small team of writers and creators who are always trying to provide content to keep our growing readership engaged and excited but we have to admit, WE CANNOT DO IT ALONE WITHOUT YOU, OUR READERS. You can submit Stories, videos, pictures, open lists, poems, memes, jokes and whatever you create that is trendiee!Trendiee connects people with all that is trending around and beyond them. name: FINT
product_desc: FINT is a peer-to-peer lending platform where borrowers can access loans/credit online at affordable rates, and investors can earn returns on their investments in these loans. Starting in Nigeria, we believe this product is scalable across other parts of West and East Africa.As a by-product of the p2p platform, we have had to develop our risk algorithm that is proprietary technology. We believe that this algorithm, in synthesis with the data we generate from our partner credit bureau can morph into a national credit rating system in Nigeria (also scalable across other intended countries), since one does not currently exist. In the long run, FINT will serve as a data hub for people looking to detect risk worthiness, loan history and most importantly, credit behavioral patterns.

name: Piggybank.ng
product_desc: In Nigeria â€“ and Africa, there is the trend of poor or non-existent financial discipline among youth (demographic 18 â€“ 40). And those who do, leave money in their bank accounts where they might end up taking it out before they really need it; or they resort to saving in wooden boxes,The average Nigerian youth earns between 75,000 to 100,000 a month and, if guided right, can commit to saving at least 10% of that every month.The idea of combining traditional savings methods with is what birthed Piggybank.ng. Piggybank.ng is a simple, convenient platform that automatically debits a customerâ€™s account, daily, weekly or monthly till they reach their set target. We are specifically targeting young professionals but we will expand to cover all working class people in Nigeria and across Africa.Piggybank.ng launched in April 2016 and has since then helped users save over 28 million naira, without any advertisement yet.Our long term goal is to be the digital bank for the next generation.
high_concept: Piggybank is the next generation digital bank for African millenials.

The hundreds of people weâ€™ve talked to love SHYFT because they can automate the turning on and off of back-up power, monitor consumption and use budgeting tools  all from the connected mobile app. We use the data to provide real-time, targeted interventions to reduce generator use. I contacted the friend hoping to place an order for the sandals but he said he couldn't deliver to my current address because of logistics issues he had encountered before. It was disappointing not just for me, but for him because he had to lose a client and his access to other potential clients was not possible. He then tried selling on the e-commerce sites available but it did not really work out because their commission rates were damn high. So one night i laid on my bed and i thought, maybe i can do something about this and then i met with three of my closest friends and we decided to come up with FapMall. FapMall is basically here to help young talented entrepreneurs make a name and some good money off their talents.

Currently, biomass provides about 93% of Nigeriaâ€™s consumed energy source as firewood and charcoal.  Although Nigeria is an agricultural country with vast amounts of forests and trees, at the present time, the majority of its agricultural waste is not being fully utilized for the production of energy. The briquettes will be made out of charcoal-dust and dry agricultural wastes, sugar cane trash, and maize trash from farmers. Simple technologies will be implemented to make it less expensive to produce briquettes.  Thus, the briquettes will be affordable by the local population. Briquettes have a high bulk density compared to fire wood and loose biomass. Because of their density and low moisture content, the briquettes give  a longer burning time which will translate to cost savings for the customer.

name: Zea Mays Foods Venture
product_desc: Zea Mays Pap is the product name. It is a fermented cereal known as Ogi, Akamu or koko locally fortified with spices, nuts, seeds and infused with herbs. The pap varieties are made from grains like sorghum, millet, yellow and white corn, wheat. The spices used are those that improve health such as cloves, ginger , black pepper, garlic, cardamon caraway ; the seeds are Peanuts, soyabeans, sesame seed, moringa seeds and herbs like Moringa leaves, lemon grass.  The grains are soaked for about three days after which they are blended with the spices or nuts , then sieved through a mesh or clean cloth. The slurry is separated from the chaff and allowed to settle. Then the waste water is taken of leaving the thick slurry. Then the slurry is poured into sack cloth to drain out water. The fermented cereal is ready to be packaged in cellophane bags and plastics. The fermented cereal can be low fibre content or high fibre content depending on the mesh size used for seiving.
markets: B2B, Food and Beverages, Small and Medium Businesses, Consumer

name: Comfy Odunayo Nigeria
product_desc: We are into the extraction and sale of Crude Palm Kernel Oil (CPKO). It has both edible and non-edible uses and is known for its lack of cholesterol and trans fatty acids. PKO is in high demand by soap makers, vegetable oil refiners, the paints industry e.t.c. It is made up of myristic and lauric fatty acids suitable in the manufacture of a number of our day-to-day products. For example, the lauric acid is important in soap making, a good soap must contain at least 15% laurate for quick lathering. The Palm Kernel Cake (PKC), on its own, is separated from the PKO through an automated process and is demanded by feed millers. Oil palm, scientifically known as Elaeis guineensis jaq, is a unique crop as its fruit produces two distinct types of oils; crude palm oil from the mesocarp and crude palm kernel oil from the kernel. Both of these oils, which are mainly made up of triglycerides, are chemically and physically different from each other with palm oil high in palmitic acid.

product_desc: Civil Engineering Construction. Equipment Hiring. Manufacturers' Representative. We market Envirobase. A product for road construction. EnviroBase is a liquid soil strenghtener for the installation of durable, virtually weatherproof unpaved roads and exceptionally strong, long lasting bases for paved roads. It is a unique blend of environmentally safe, non-toxic compounds that, when properly applied, allows the construction of a durable, strong, virtually water resistant soil layer via an ionic stabilization process. It is applied using standard road equipment and suitable for virtually all soil types. It uses water as a carrier to evenly spread and distribute the product throughout the soil layer thus allowing the ionic stabilization process to take place.The increased density of the treated soil layer forms durable, exceptionally strong road bases for both paved and unpaved roads. All these are guaranteed without the need for importation and use of crushed stones.

It has an on-board battery charger, which ensures internal charging approach, eliminating the need for costly external grid, solar, wind, charging sources. name: Akanon Plantain Flour
product_desc: In terms of its nutrient content, unripe plantain is one of the healthiest foods in the world as well as a curative agent for diabetes and iron deficiency. Type 2 diabetes is more common in Nigeria. There was increase in the average prevalence rate from 2.7% to 3.9% and annual increase of 0.3%. Over the years, diet was implicated both as one of the aetiological factors to the development of diabetes as well as a key component in diabetes management. Plant foods like plantain are the most important dietary sources to meet the nutritional needs of majority of the population in sub-Saharan Africa and Asian subcontinent. There are mounting scientific evidence to date on their various health-promoting properties. The American Diabetes Association (ADA) position that the public should consume adequate amounts of dietary fibre from a variety of plant foods. Unripe Plantain is rich in vitamins most especially Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) and carotene.
high_concept: Curative agent for diabetes and iron deficiency

If you have ever been through poverty and hardship, then you can surely feel their hunger and pains. You donâ€™t need a degree to know that people from very poor backgrounds will do anything for money, from crude oil theft, pipe line destruction, sea piracy, and armed robbery to kidnapping. Whoâ€™s Fault? Even if you lock them down and throw away the keys you only create more monsters. I believe its high time we all start making a change no matter how small. You can make much difference today by encouraging a child today in one of those neglected, under-resourced communities in the creeks.
high_concept: "Donate a tin of milk to a malnourished child in Africa today"

name: ColdHubs
product_desc: The ColdHub concept was developed to help the 470 million farmers and retailers in developing countries (Rockefeller Foundation; Food Waste and Spoilage Initiative 2014), who do not have access to reliable cold storage. It is estimated that small farmers and retailers suffer a 25% reduction in their income due to loss of value in an average of 45% of their vegetable harvests, 35% of their fruit harvests.ColdHubs, are modular, solar-powered walk-in cold rooms that provide  24/7 off-grid storage and preservation of perishable foods. They are installed in markets and farms within the reach of farmers and retailers. Fresh produce are placed in clean plastic crates and these crates are stacked inside the cold room. Cold room  temperature of 5Â°C extends the freshness of fruits, vegetables and other perishable food to about 21 days instead of 2 days without refrigeration.The Hubs are placed in market areas and farms which has a cluster of farmers.
high_concept: Solar cold storage for developing countries, 80% food waste reduction, 25% income increase

product_desc: The all year farming of non-genetically modified maize on 100 hectares of farmland in central Nigeria. There is an overwhelming and burgeoning local and international demand for maize for bio-fuel, animal feed and as staple food ingredient among not just the Nigerian population but Africa and the world at large. The total Industrial Demand for maize in Nigeria is forecast at 1.8 million tons while domestic demand was at 30 million tons in 2013/14; a figure which rose up from 1.7 million tons and 26 million tons respectively in 2012/13.  The void we intend to appropriate value from is from the shortfall observed when it is seen that Nigeria even as the largest producer of Maize in Africa only produces 8-9 million tons. At present, the price of maize is about $1000-1200 per tonne and this is a figure which inflates tremendously higher in periods of excessive scarcity which are usually in the dry season when maize is not cultivated for lack of rainfall (November to June).

The audience simply pull out their phones, scan the code, and like that, a like on your Facebook page is delivered. That simple + easy. It's like having a live Facebook Like Button. But here comes the coolest part. This same principle can be applied to an activity like retail checkouts. It's so easy that,Â actually, QR codes are not needed. You can directly scan the barcodes on products. It's the power of the cash register in the palm of your hands, and it's all self-service.

The Central Bank of Nigeria estimated that Nigerian students spend over N900 Billion (approx $50m) annually in Internationally for tuition, feeding and housing.This deficit leaves us with over 1.1 million students who are without options for the opportunity gain admissions into higher education institutions.BAU will focus on using mobile and web technologies with adequate local support and centres to provide quality learning to a wide array of students across diverse backgrounds.
